name: Lino Perros Women Red Handbag
description:
Update your style quotient with ease by adding this stylish bag from lino perros to your accessory collection. Roomy and comfortable to carry, the smooth silhouette of this bag blends well with any outfit.

Width: 32 cm

Branded zips and brand badge appliquéd on the front

Care
Wipe surface with a damp, clean cloth to remove dust

name: Lino Perros Women Handbag
description:
Style Note
Understated and compact, yet spacious, this Linos Perros bag works the military aesthetic with its rugged cool. Add this to your accessory arsenal and you'll not regret it. The right bag for versatile styling, use this piece to pare down a dressy frock for a casual do or to add a hint of sporty to an oh-so-girly ensemble.

Product Details
Polyester blend upper
Two short handles
Appliqued brand patch on the front
Two zippered pockets on the sides and one in the front (under a pocket with a velcro closure)
One compartment in the front and a main zippered compartment
A zippered pocket and a pouch inside
A removable and adjustable shoulder strap made of fabric

Material and Care
Blended polyester
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust

Size
Height: 13 cm
Width: 20 cm
Depth: 8 cm

description:
It's comfort unparalleled once you slip into these socks from playboy. Made of a blended fabric, these charcoal grey and black diamond design socks can be worn both for sporting events and casual days.

This john players shirt gets a sartorial stamp of approval, with it's refined collar, silhouetted tailoring and it's fine, luxe fabric. Make the right impression with this shirt - be it on lazy weekends or during after-hours dinner. The best bet for semi-formal Fridays, wear this with fitted denims and ankle boots!

Warm iron

name: John Players Men Gingham Shirt
description:
Style Note
john players will have you spoilt for choice when it comes to casual options with this comfortable and stylish checked shirt. Paired with comfortable chinos or jeans, they add quite the splash of colour and trend to your look. This shirt comes from their Retro Beat collection known for the use of bold and bright colours.

Product Details
A shirt with white and red checks, short sleeves, a spread collar, full buttoned placket and a patch pocket with rounded corners on the left chest

Material and Care
Cotton rich
Machine wash cold with like colours
Do not bleach

Use warm iron

John Players' trim fit
